en-US.summary: Find out which world leader you are, which founding father you are, or which mythical beast you are!
en-US.name: past lives quiz
en-US.description:
Past Lives Quiz allows you to take different quizzes to find out who or what you were in another life.  
You can find out which world leader you are, which founding father you were, or which mythical beast you'd be if they actually existed. 
Once you found out who or what you are in another life, you'll learn more about that person or beast. It's educational and fun!
